alert.note: Alert for Hickman; Humphreys; Lewis; Perry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 9:24PM CDT until March 24 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lewis County in Middle Tennessee... Perry County in Middle Tennessee... Southern Humphreys County in Middle Tennessee... Western Hickman County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 923 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bruceton to near Parsons to Morris Chapel, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Centerville, Linden, Hurricane Mills, Lobelville, Mousetail Landing State Park, Pinewood, Pleasantville, Flatwoods, I-40 Near The Tennessee River and Bucksnort. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 136 and 160. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
